thread.title: Ground News - SC still among the worst for flu as COVID, RSV also makes the rounds in 'tripledemic'
thread.title_full: Ground News - SC still among the worst for flu as COVID, RSV also makes the rounds in 'tripledemic'

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - SC still among the worst for flu as COVID, RSV also makes the rounds in 'tripledemic'
text:
Summary by Ground News South Carolina has one of the highest rates for flu infections in the country. The number of patients crowding into clinics and hospitals topped most recent seasons. Public health officials are calling for greater preventive measures, like vaccination. Some hospitals are also seeing an increase in other respiratory viruses, like COVID-19. Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
The Post and Courier Center High Factuality Independent: Evening Post Industries SC still among the worst for flu as COVID, RSV also makes the rounds in 'tripledemic' South Carolina remains one of the worst states for flu as public health officials call for greater preventive measures, like vaccination and hand-washing. Some hospitals are also seeing an increase in other viral disease, such as COVID-19.
